entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023
